text: Da dishang you xuduo linjin de quyu, you putao yuan, you zhuangjia, you ye zao shu, qizhong you er zhu tonggen sheng de, er zhu yi gen sheng de,(zhexie dou shi) yong tongyang de shui guangai de, wo que shi zhe yibufen guoshi bi na yibufen jiamei. Duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
